p: Control mint plants showed no metal concentration higher than other reported studies or WHO limits. Instead, differences in metal concentration were emphasized. Very significant ( p < 0.01) differences of Cd and Ni content in the root–stem system and no significant changes ( p > 0.05) in root–leaves and stem–leaves were recorded. In root–leaves systems, Ni showed significant changes due to the concentration registered in root ( p = 0.01). In addition, no significant change ( p > 0.05) was detected between plant organs in controls in case of Pb concentration ( Table 3).
